description.emerald:
A rock-crushing attack
that may lower DEFENSE.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that may
also cut DEFENSE.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.
description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
lower DEFENSE.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
lower DEFENSE.
description.ruby-sapphire:
A rock-crushing attack
that may lower DEFENSE.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user slugs the
foe with a shattering
punch.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.
description.platinum:
The user slugs the
foe with a shattering
punch.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user hits with a
punch that may lower
the target’s Defense.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.
description.black-white:
The user attacks with a punch that can
shatter a rock. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat.

The user attacks with a punch that can
shatter a rock. It may also lower the

description.x-y:

This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
This move can also shatter rocks in the field.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
